snippet: The Luxembourg-based steelmaker continues to struggle while demand for steel remains at depressed levels.
abstract: ArcelorMittal reports net loss of $345 million for first three months of 2013 as it continues to struggle with lower demand for steel; loss contrasts with $92 million profit in same period of 2012; sales for first quarter were down 13 percent from previous year, to $19.8 billion.
lead_paragraph: The Luxembourg-based steelmaker continues to struggle while demand for steel remains at depressed levels.

headline.main: ArcelorMittal Reports Quarterly Loss of $345 Million
headline.print_headline: Declining Sales Bring Loss Of $345 Million at Steel Giant
